settings.title: Can anyone visit your showroom?
settings.content: Absolutely!  We hope everyone will have a chance to visit and be inspired by our amazing collection of vendors.  The Dallas and Houston showrooms are open 9am – 5pm, Monday through Friday.  The Austin location is a by appointment only Trade Resource Library for designers to schedule meetings.

settings.title: Where are you located?
settings.content:
Our Dallas Showroom is located in the Dallas Design Center at 1025 N. Stemmons Fwy #210, adjacent to CODARUS.  

Our new Houston Showroom is located on the Third Floor of the Decorative Center of Houston at 5120 Woodway, Suite #3029

The Austin location is a  By-Appointment Trade Resource Library for interior designers located at  1411 West 6th Street Unit B.   Parking is available on Oakland Ave. (turn left on Oakland just before you reach the showroom),
